showerReviews.reviewText: Absolutely LOVE it here!  The staff are amazing, helpful, and kind.  The facility is always incredibly clean and well maintained, and there is something for everyone from spin classes to yoga. …

I love this Y.  The people are friendly, the staff are knowledgeable and professional.  The building is clean and easily accessed.  Plenty of equipment and well spaced out.  Classes are being added back in, so all is great.
Clean, great machines. Staff always helpful. No pool, however.

I have been to a number of facilities around the country but never experienced the smell that hits you walking in to the men’s locker room. The toilets are not vented and the floor trap needs water to block the septic. The open design is …
Friendly staff.  Very conveniently located and pretty well equipped.  The locker room and showers can be busy, but that can happen anywhere. …

Very clean, with plenty of equipment for use. Private showers available, with body wash in every stall. Also, sanitizer in each stall for use, when you are done with shower area. There is no swimming pool at this location. I'm hoping for a swimming pool, in the future.

showerReviews.reviewText: Great facility to play soccer or football, four turf fields, clean and well-managed, lots of free parking available, cafeteria and washrooms are also available

Really great facility for sports.  The indoor full field is pristine.  They have stadium seating on both sides of the field.  Lighting is direct and the temperature is well-controlled and comfortable even during the winter.  Concession area is spectacular.  Comfortable couches, fireplace, large screen televisions and clean bathrooms.
